p: For the antimicrobial assay, the gram-positive bacteria ( Bacillus megaterium, Bacillus cereus, Candida albicans, Candida glabrata, Sarcina lutea, Bacillus subtillis and Staphylococcus aureus) and gram-negative bacteria ( Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Escherichia coli, Salmonella typhi, Salmonella paratyphi, Shigella dysenteriae, Vibrio parahemolyticus, Vibrio mimicus, Klebsiella pneumonia, Shigella boydii) were utilized which were supplied from University of Dhaka, Bangladesh.
